warmup_exercises.execution_notes: Extend arms to the sides and make small circles forward for 30 seconds, then backward for 30 seconds.
Roll shoulders forward in a circular motion for 30 seconds, then backward for 30 seconds.
Slowly straighten your arms and lift them until you feel a stretch in your chest. Hold for 15 seconds.
Bend your elbow and gently pull your elbow toward your head with your other hand. Hold for 15 seconds. Repeat on the other side.

warmup_exercises.setup_notes: Stand with feet together, arms at your sides.
warmup_exercises.execution_notes: Jump, spreading your legs and raising your arms overhead. Return to starting position. Perform for 1 minute.

exercises.setup: Position the cable at a low setting and use a bar attachment. Stand facing away from the cable machine with arms overhead.
execution: 1. Grip the bar with an overhand grip (palms facing down).
2. Extend your arms fully overhead, keeping your elbows slightly bent.
3. Keeping your upper arms stationary, slowly lower the weight behind your head by bending your elbows.
4. Pause briefly at the bottom, ensuring you feel a stretch in your triceps.
5. Extend your elbows to return to the starting position, squeezing your triceps at the top.
exercises.weight: Choose a weight that allows you to complete 8 reps with good form. Increase weight gradually as you get stronger.
exercises.alternative_exercise_setup: Lie on a bench with your feet flat on the floor. Hold a barbell with an overhand grip, slightly narrower than shoulder-width.
alternative_exercise_execution: 1. Extend your arms straight up, holding the barbell.
2. Slowly lower the barbell towards your forehead by bending your elbows.
3. Pause briefly at the bottom, ensuring you feel a stretch in your triceps.
4. Extend your elbows to return to the starting position, squeezing your triceps at the top.
exercises.alternative_exercise_weight: Select a weight that allows you to perform 8 repetitions with proper form. Gradually increase the weight as you gain strength.
exercises.additional_tips: Focus on controlled movements and avoid swinging the weight. Maintain a slight bend in your elbows throughout the exercise to protect your joints.

exercises.setup: Lie on a bench with your feet flat on the floor. Grip a barbell slightly narrower than shoulder-width.
execution: 1. Lower the bar to your chest, keeping your elbows tucked in.
2. Press the bar back up to the starting position, fully extending your arms.
exercises.weight: Choose a weight that allows you to complete 8 reps with good form. Increase weight gradually as you get stronger.
exercises.alternative_exercise_setup: Attach a straight bar to a cable machine. Stand facing the machine, gripping the bar with an overhand grip.
alternative_exercise_execution: 1. Extend your arms fully, keeping your elbows close to your sides.
2. Slowly lower the bar by bending your elbows.
3. Extend your elbows to return to the starting position, squeezing your triceps at the top.
exercises.alternative_exercise_weight: Select a weight that allows you to perform 8 repetitions with proper form. Gradually increase the weight as you gain strength.
exercises.additional_tips: Keep your elbows close to your body throughout the exercise to maximize triceps activation.

exercises.setup: Adjust the machine seat so that your shoulders are aligned with the handles.  Ensure a comfortable grip.
execution: 1. Sit comfortably on the machine and grasp the handles.
2. Push the handles away from your chest, fully extending your arms.
3. Slowly return to the starting position, feeling a stretch in your chest.
exercises.weight: Choose a weight that allows you to complete 8 reps with good form. Increase weight gradually as you get stronger.
exercises.alternative_exercise_setup: Lie on a bench with your feet flat on the floor. Grip a barbell with an overhand grip, slightly wider than shoulder-width.
alternative_exercise_execution: 1. Lower the bar to your chest, keeping your elbows slightly bent.
2. Press the bar back up to the starting position, fully extending your arms.
exercises.alternative_exercise_weight: Select a weight that allows you to perform 8 repetitions with proper form. Gradually increase the weight as you gain strength.
exercises.additional_tips: Maintain a controlled movement throughout the exercise. Avoid bouncing the weight.

exercises.setup: Adjust the bench to an incline position (around 30-45 degrees). Lie on the bench with your feet flat on the floor. Hold a dumbbell in each hand.
execution: 1. Lower the dumbbells to your chest, keeping your elbows slightly bent.
2. Press the dumbbells back up to the starting position, fully extending your arms.
exercises.weight: Choose a weight that allows you to complete 8 reps with good form. Increase weight gradually as you get stronger.
exercises.alternative_exercise_setup: Sit on a machine with handles positioned at chest height. Adjust the weight.
alternative_exercise_execution: 1. Extend your arms out to the sides, keeping a slight bend in your elbows.
2. Bring your arms together in front of you, squeezing your chest muscles.
3. Slowly return to the starting position.
exercises.alternative_exercise_weight: Select a weight that allows you to perform 8 repetitions with proper form. Gradually increase the weight as you gain strength.
exercises.additional_tips: Maintain a controlled movement throughout the exercise. Avoid swinging the dumbbells.

exercises.setup: Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart. Hold a barbell with an overhand grip, slightly wider than shoulder-width.
execution: 1. Press the weight overhead, keeping your core engaged and elbows slightly bent.
2. Slowly lower the weight back to the starting position.
exercises.weight: Choose a weight that allows you to complete 8 reps with good form. Increase weight gradually as you get stronger.
exercises.additional_tips: Maintain a controlled movement throughout the exercise. Avoid swinging the weight.
